inclusion.criterion: meet criteria for living kidney donation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: approved by the UF Health Shands Kidney Transplant Medical Review Board
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recipient may be HCV antibody negative or anti-HCV antibody positive but HCV RNA negative by PCR
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recipient must meet the criteria for kidney transplantation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: approved by the UF Health Kidney Transplant Program Medical Review Board
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no evidence of alcoholic liver disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no evidence of bleeding from esophageal varices
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection but is on combination therapy and direct antiviral drugs. Recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma.
